head.supplied: Oct. 29 1866 ¶ ¶ Received from Dr Mueller, the undermentioned sums ¶ H. Petersen...

div.p: P67/474, unit 381, VPRS 3991 inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Office, Public Record Office, Victoria.

MS is annotated 'No 18' of 74 receipts covering materials supplied from the Botanic Garden for the Intercolonial Exhibition of Australasia, Melbourne, 1866-7, for which M was one of the Commissioners. Oct. 29 1866
Received from Dr Mueller, the undermentioned sums
